data.persona: I can cast spells at will.  I have arcane knowledge.  My robes have stars and moons on them.
data.description:
You are in the Simple Town.
The town is a small area with a few buildings. There are many shops and basic need places. The road that leads into town is dirt and rock.
There's a The road, a rock, a tower, a dirt, two shops, a hut, a buildings, and a road here.
The enchantress is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to hit the enchantress with the rock
data.mid_motivation: I plan to escape her enchantment today
data.long_motivation: I hope to return to my kingdom in the next few weeks
